weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you can play in me, but you need to bundle up! What am I?

hints.text: 🧤 You can make snowballs with me.

weather.question: I come down from the sky, and make everything wet. You need an umbrella! What am I?
I am big and bright, and give you warmth and light. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees. Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm strong. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can blow your hat off.
🌬️ You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain! What am I?
I am a big storm with lots of wind and rain. Sometimes there is thunder and lightning! What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ You should stay inside when I come.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, that you can see after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You can see me when the sun shines after the rain.

weather.question: I am tiny ice pellets falling from the sky. I can bounce when I hit the ground! What am I?
I am very hot weather with no rain for a long time, drying up plants and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I happen a lot in the desert

weather.question: I am a rotating column of air. I am a violent whirling wind that can destroy everything in my path! What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am a very dangerous type of wind.
🏠 You should take shelter in a basement from me.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?
I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥗 Sometimes I am eaten in salads.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and have eight arms. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have many arms to help me.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with sharp teeth. Some people are scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have rows and rows of teeth.
🌊 People often see my fin cutting through the water.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and makes a clicking sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very friendly and playful.
🗣️ I use echolocation to find my food.
🌊 I jump out of the water.

ocean.question: I am a colorful home in the ocean built by tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of little skeletons.
☀️ I am dying because the ocean is getting too warm

ocean.question: I'm a giant creature of the sea, the largest animal on earth, that sings a lonely song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a type of whale.
🐳 I feed mostly on tiny shrimp-like creatures.

ocean.question: I am a flat fish that blends in with the ocean floor. I have both my eyes on one side of my body! What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ My eyes are a bit unusual.
🪨 I can be hard to spot.
🍳 My shape is like that of a fried breakfast.

ocean.question: I am a type of strong, swirling underwater current created by the tides and the earth spinning, sometimes ships avoid me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am a very powerful current.
🌪️ I am also a weather phenomenon, that can happen on land

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean where it is very, very dark, and strange creatures with lights on their bodies live. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 It is always night where I am.
🌊 I am at the very bottom of the sea.
